name: Final Fright - Prototype (Looks Cozy Labs)
description:
-RELEASING FOR FREE HALLOWEEN WEEKEND-

Final Fright - Prototype is a free teaser demo of my upcoming game, a much more involved, complex effort. Any donations are greatly appreciated and will go toward development of the full game. You can wishlist it on Steam and follow its development on Twitter at @LooksCozyLabs. Enjoy!

Controls

NOTE: Characters besides Billy have limited movesets and cannot interact with items

NOTE: Only Xbox and PS controllers supported

ActionControllerKeyboardMoveLeft stick or D-padArrowsJump (UI Confirm)
Button SouthSpacebarAttackButton WestVSpecialButton NorthCInteract (UI Cancel)Button EastXBack AttackLeft trigger or Button West + Button SouthZ or V + SpacebarCycle GrenadeLeft shoulderLeft shiftUse GrenadeRight shoulder (hold)G (hold)Pause (UI Start)StartP Other techniques
  • Double tap left/right to sprint
  • Double tap up/down to roll
  • Attack while holding down near an enemy lying on the ground to stomp them
  • Hold attack to charge a heavy attack (stomp can also be charged)
Credits

Nick Severny - Animation

Brent Richard - Sound Design

Eeve Somepx - Fonts

Murilo Neves - Animation

Polaria Poyon - Music

Thank you so much to everyone who made this game possible!
